item.description:
Hello Boston Ladies, my apologies for the holdup with getting things started. I am now starting our monthly brunches, so get ready for a fabulous time and let's break in our group this weekend with fun, laughter, and new introductions :) The future brunches may be themed, but this brunch will be casual. So dress which ever way it makes you feel good, come prepared to share and mingle lovelies!

Cancellations & My Contact Info

The details for the brunch are above... The reservation is set for 12:45, so if you are not going to be able to make it please notify me by Friday by 5pm. You can email me directly at: LLR81@yahoo.com. I will post my number on Saturday so you all can text me if anything last minute happens. We all know emergencies happen, so  If you are going to cancel last minute  please try and so by Saturday 5pm.

 

Thanks, and I am excited to finally meet you all!

Lisa

Head Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a brown Fedora!
item.name: FIRST BOSTON LADIES BRUNCH
